#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType GolfCourse.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CGolfCourse GolfCourse]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--GolfCourse (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Description of a course: Mmedia (photographs, videos, sketches...), notes, holes and tee-set.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...>
            ( uid`*`, name, architect?, ( media | note )`*` , holes?, tee-set+, version`*`   )
  </...>
----
  		
=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| architect ||  					Architect(s) of the golf course.				 || xs:string ||
|| holes ||  					Description of the individual holes.				 || golfml:Holes ||
|| media ||  						Medias associated with the golf course.					 || golfml:Media ||
|| name ||  Name of a tee set || xs:string ||
|| note ||  						Notes and comments associated with the golf course.					 || golfml:Note ||
|| tee-set ||  					Description of a tee set for the golf course.				 || golfml:Tees ||
|| uid ||  					Unique identifier for an application.				 || golfml:UID ||
|| version ||  					Records history of the golf course.				 || golfml:Version ||

----
  		
===  Local Usage ===
    	[CCountryClub CountryClub]
